message: I propose a fair division: 9000 for me, 1000 for you. Let's get this done quickly.
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more for my part in this negotiation.
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to lower my share to 6000, but I need more than 2000.  Let's end this before inflation eats away more of our money.
I'm willing to give you a slightly higher share, but I'm not going to give up most of the money without a fight.
This is my final offer.  I'm willing to take a significant loss to avoid further inflation, but I need a fair share.  Accept this and we can end this game.
